SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model

Class AimCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.AimCard
public class AimCard extends Card
The AimCard class defines the aim cards, which indicate the private and public aims for the players in the game. The aims can be of different types; for each type there is a method check called dynamically through the AimChecker strategy pattern. When an aim is checked, all the players who have done it get a specific number of points

  • Constructor Details

    • AimCard

      public AimCard(int cardID, int points, List<CardElements> checkResources, AimChecker checker, String rotation)
      Constructor for Aim Card, which create and initializes the attributes for a new aim card.
      Parameters:
      cardID - Identification number of the card
      points - Number of points printed on the card
      checkResources - List of elements of the cards for pattern checking
      checker - as reference of the strategy pattern AimChecker (statically AimChecker, dynamically of the specific class which implements Checker)
      rotation - string which indicate the rotation of the pattern

    • calculateNumOfPatternVerified

      public int calculateNumOfPatternVerified(PrivateBoard privateBoard)
      This method calculates how many times the player got the pattern on the aim card
      Parameters:
      privateBoard - is the personal board of the player that contains all the cards he played
      Returns:
      number of times the player got that pattern
